name: Winter's Symphonies
description: After shutting the door to a life many would envy, the protagonist of the story, Sophie, returns to her one and only hometown. The town is just as she remembers it. She, however, is not. She can't help seeing herself as emptyâ€•as empty as the barren trees around her.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 Processor: Core i3 of Sandy Bridge generation or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Series DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Sound Devices compatible with Direct Sound Additional Notes: (1920x1080 recommended, with lower resolutions YMMV.)
